sn55.54:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmim nigrodharame.
sn55.54:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula bhikkhu bhagavato civarakammam karonti:
sn55.54:1.7: Atha kho mahanamo sakko yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho mahanamo sakko bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn55.54:1.11: Na kho netam, bhante, bhagavato sammukha sutam sammukha patiggahitam
sn55.54:1.12: sappannena upasakena sappanno upasako abadhiko dukkhito balhagilano ovaditabbo”ti.
sn55.54:2.1: “Sappannena, mahanama, upasakena sappanno upasako abadhiko dukkhito balhagilano catuhi assasaniyehi dhammehi assasetabbo:
sn55.54:2.3: atthayasmato buddhe aveccappasado itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.54:3.1: Sappannena, mahanama, upasakena sappanno upasako abadhiko dukkhito balhagilano imehi catuhi assasaniyehi dhammehi assasetva evamassa vacaniyo:
sn55.54:3.4: ‘atthi me matapitusu apekkha’ti, so evamassa vacaniyo:
sn55.54:3.7: no cepayasma matapitusu apekkham karissati, marissateva.
sn55.54:3.8: Sadhayasma, ya te matapitusu apekkha tam pajaha’ti.
sn55.54:4.2: ‘ya me matapitusu apekkha sa pahina’ti, so evamassa vacaniyo:
sn55.54:4.5: ‘atthi me puttadaresu apekkha’ti, so evamassa vacaniyo:
sn55.54:4.8: no cepayasma puttadaresu apekkham karissati, marissateva.
sn55.54:4.9: Sadhayasma, ya te puttadaresu apekkha tam pajaha’ti.
sn55.54:5.2: ‘ya me puttadaresu apekkha sa pahina’ti, so evamassa vacaniyo:
sn55.54:5.5: ‘atthi me manusakesu pancasu kamagunesu apekkha’ti, so evamassa vacaniyo:
sn55.54:5.6: ‘manusakehi kho, avuso, kamehi dibba kama abhikkantatara ca panitatara ca.
sn55.54:5.7: Sadhayasma, manusakehi kamehi cittam vutthapetva catumaharajikesu devesu cittam adhimocehi’ti.
sn55.54:6.2: ‘manusakehi me kamehi cittam vutthitam, catumaharajikesu devesu cittam adhimocitan’ti, so evamassa vacaniyo:
sn55.54:6.3: ‘catumaharajikehi kho, avuso, devehi tavatimsa deva abhikkantatara ca panitatara ca.
sn55.54:6.4: Sadhayasma, catumaharajikehi devehi cittam vutthapetva tavatimsesu devesu cittam adhimocehi’ti.
sn55.54:7.2: ‘catumaharajikehi me devehi cittam vutthitam, tavatimsesu devesu cittam adhimocitan’ti, so evamassa vacaniyo:
sn55.54:7.7: paranimmitavasavattihi kho, avuso, devehi brahmaloko abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca.
sn55.54:7.8: Sadhayasma, paranimmitavasavattihi devehi cittam vutthapetva brahmaloke cittam adhimocehi’ti.
sn55.54:7.10: ‘paranimmitavasavattihi me devehi cittam vutthitam, brahmaloke cittam adhimocitan’ti, so evamassa vacaniyo:
sn55.54:7.12: Sadhayasma, brahmaloka cittam vutthapetva sakkayanirodhe cittam upasamharahi’ti.
sn55.54:8.2: ‘brahmaloka me cittam vutthitam, sakkayanirodhe cittam upasamharami’ti;
sn55.54:8.3: evam vimuttacittassa kho, mahanama, upasakassa asava vimuttacittena bhikkhuna na kinci nanakaranam vadami, yadidam—
